title: The Army Painter Mega Paint Set 3 - Warpaints Quickshade Washes Set - Airbrush Medium Bundle
features: COMPLETE SET OF 50 WARGAMER MINIATURE PAINTS + 1 DETAIL PAINT BRUSH - An exceptional model paint set that includes 50 Warpaints: 39 nontoxic acrylic miniatures paints, 5 metallics, 4 Quickshade Washes, and 2 Effects paints; 1 triangular-handled Regiment detail paint brush and a detail-rich painting guide

FANTASTIC CONSISTENCY AND COLOR PIGMENT - Each dropper bottle in this plastic model paint set is 0.6 oz/18 ml. The paints are not too thick and not too watery and the dropper cap system enables you to administer the exact amounts you need without having to open the lid all the time. Ergonomic design that prevents wastage and drying out

THE WASHES ADD BOTH SHADING AND COLOR TONE - The 11 Quickshade Washes in this miniature paint set have extra heavy pigment that allows you to easily create depth and shade, add color tone and achieve perfect shading on your army set miniatures in one quick application; includes a FREE Wargamers Army Painting Guide containing tips and techniques

RIGHT CONSISTENCY; DO NOT REQUIRE THINNING —This liquid acrylic paint set of quickshade washes saves you time from paint preparation; no need to dilute. The consistency is not too thick, but perfectly thin enough to easily cover the nooks and crevices of even the smallest wargame models

THINNER AND FLOW IMPROVER IN ONE BOTTLE – This airbrush medium effectively dilutes and prepares your paints for effective application and perfect flow through your airbrush. Perfect for getting even coats of paint with maximum coverage when painting your Warhammer, Star Wars, or DnD models
description: With this bundle, you receive an INCREDIBLE Set of 50 Meticulously Selected Paints for Models and Miniatures, 11 Quickshade washes to create depth and shade and add color tone to your miniatures and a thinner and flow improver if you decide to use an airbrush. Combining premium quality materials, innovative, ergonomic designs, and practicable price, this bundle of The Army Painter products is an exceptional choice for wargamers.
The Army Painter Mega Paint Set
comes with 39 Acrylic Paints; 5 Metallics; 4 Quickshade Washes; The Wargamer Painting Guide.
The Army Painter Quickshade Wash Set
contains 11 Quickshade Washes that will get you perfect shading every time and the option of adding a color tone to your models.
Included tones: Strong, Soft, Dark Light, Mild Brown, Military Shader and 5 colored washes loaded with heavy pigments of specific colors in the popular Warpaints ink resin base. These washes are:
FLESH WASH - the perfect tone for shading lighter flesh tones.
GREEN TONE WASH - for all Greens, Necrotic Flesh, or Barbarian flesh
RED TONE WASH - when applied on a metal primer, you’ll get that great evil Khorne look.
BLUE TONE WASH - use with Barbarian Flesh and Necrotic Flesh Warpaints to achieve a striking cold-from-the-grave look
PURPLE TONE WASH - looks stunning on a metal primer for Slaaneshi-like look

- the perfect blend of thinner medium and flow improver to assist you in reducing steps in your paint workflow. Simply dilute in the ratio of 1 part medium to 1–2 parts Warpaint, and you have the perfect airbrush paint blend with optimal flow properties.
